original_text: then he who brings his offering shall offer to the Lord a grain offering of a tenth of an ephah of fine flour, mixed with a quarter of a hin of oil;
korean_text: 그러한 헌물을 드리는 자는 고운 가루 십분의 일에 기름 사분의 일 힌을 섞어 여호와께 소제로 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: then he who brings his offering
shall offer to the Lord a grain offering
of a tenth of an ephah of fine flour
mixed with a quarter of a hin of oil
